New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 26 balls, the highest by an Indian in a T20I match
Virat Kohli scored 59 runs off 44 balls, equalling Rohit Sharma's record for most T20I fifties
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav and Virat Kohli contributed 78 runs in the final five overs
Pre-Game Insights: Hong Kong captain Nizakat Khan won the toss and opted to bowl first
Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 21 off 13 balls
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli formed a 91-run partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match
India qualified for the Super 4 stage of the Asia Cup 2022
Next match against the second-placed team in Group A on September 4, 2022
